name: Leuven Treasure Hunt
description: Follow the map of questions and find the treasure!

questions.question: What is the main topic in the M-Museum
questions.extraInfo: Art museum opened in 2009, architect-designed to unite old buildings with contemporary architecture.

questions.question: How many statues are on the walls?
questions.extraInfo: 15th-century, Gothic-style, former municipal headquarters with spires & 236 sculptures on the walls.
